component:carbon-components-ember/compon.title: CarbonButton
component:carbon-components-ember/compon.text: The Carbon Button  {{import Button from 'carbon-components-ember/components/button'}} <Button @onClick={{fn this.onclick}} @danger={{false}} > Button Text </Button>

attributes.name: CarbonButton
attributes.description:
The Carbon Button

   {{import Button from 'carbon-components-ember/components/button'}}

   <Button @onClick={{fn this.onclick}} @danger={{false}} > Button Text </Button>

arguments.name: loading
arguments.description: Will display a spinning Wheel inside the button

arguments.name: primary
arguments.description: Indicates if the action is the primary one

arguments.name: danger
arguments.description: Indicates if the action is dangerous, showing a confirmation dialog before calling onClick

arguments.name: confirmText
arguments.description: If the action is dangerous, this text message will be shown in the dialog

arguments.name: ghost
arguments.description: If the action is a ghost button
